subject: Order number ssn3918
description_text:
Ordered pedals and haptics. Pedals come in. Haptics did not. Ive been waiting and waiting and waiting. I was told somebody was going to reach out to me to fix the issue. Nobody ever reached out. So i want my money back for the haptics and the mounts or i want my items. But the pedals come in 2 weeks ago. So just wondering how i can get this resolved. Ive reached out countless times via email. And tried countless phone calls that wouldn't even go through. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: The support link does not bring me to the ticket Sent from my iPhone
